channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Helicopter crashes in Arizona mountains, killing 4 people aboard
item.description: Officials say four people have been killed when a helicopter crashed in the mountains in Arizona

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Friday’s Mega Millions
item.description: The winning numbers in Friday evening’s drawing of the "Mega Millions" game were: 06-13-34-43-52, Mega Ball: 4, Megaplier:

item.title: Trial to begin for police officer charged in delayed response to Uvalde school shooting
item.description: One of the first officers on the scene at the 2022 school shooting in Uvalde, Texas, is about to stand trial

item.title: Firefighters battle major blaze at Denver apartment complex under construction
item.description: Officials say firefighters are battling a large blaze tearing through a three-story apartment complex under construction in Denver

item.title: What to know about the Uvalde school shooting's first trial over police response
item.description: The first criminal trial related to the slow police response to the deadly school shooting in Uvalde, Texas, is set to begin
